_sText:
I saw a map.
It was made from the Hexagon shape.
I was inspired to make it better.


fy_manfly_hexamillion
16-28 players 
<object width="400" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/TaGFKXBHKGw&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/TaGFKXBHKGw&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" width="390" height="344"></embed></object>


ok this map is made of hexagons with a base diameter of 192. this makes the map like a rat hole race in spots. I have used simple shapes to promote all areas of the performance. I want others to take this from here.

3 gravity lifts, and a few strategically placed jumping ledges and gravity lift tricks which truly help a veteran player around the map.

This map I found is amazing for snipers. 
It has long corridors of open sight. Its easy to hunt, good natural cover built into the landscape of hexagons.

The framerates I get are good. 100+ 

My lighting is of course my own blend of lights.rad thanks to: Sgt.Mess/Lost/Twixxx


Special thanks goes out to the Danger Zone Studio for helping me beta test this many many times.

This has been over 24 hours of mapping time.
22 compiles.


good times.



Please download this map.

Its a gooder.
